transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan bolun?
Executive: Sir Nirmal Chand se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan, haan baat kar rahe hain, bataiye.
Executive: Sir main Nancy baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART head office se. Aapne helpline number pe call kiya hua tha sir.
Customer: Haan bataiye na.
Executive: Aapne sir aapka call aaya hua tha sir helpline number 9696 pe.
Customer: Haan, office office se kiya tha sir.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir koi kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Danish ji phone kiya tha sir shayad.
Executive: Kya kya sir?
Customer: Danish bolke koi hai na?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Phone kiya tha. Wo isliye kiya tha wo na aapka catalog designing team hai aapka catalog design ho raha hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To material vagera ke liye call kiya hoga unhone. To aapne respond nahi kiya tha unko tab to aapne fir call back isi number pe kiya tha kya?
Customer: Haan haan Danish ko main kiya tha to
Executive: Jis number se aaya tha shayad pata nahi.
Executive: Nahi sir aapne ye na helpline number pe kar diya.
Customer: Haan haan theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Koi aur issue to nahi hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi wo phone kiya isliye hi phone kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha aur sir mujhe ye baat aap ek baat aur ye batao aap by lead vagera use kyun?
Customer: Catalog update ho gaya kya?
Executive: Ho raha hai sir kaam chal raha hai aapko fir se call aayega Danish ka wo aap tension mat lo. Aur aap mujhe batao.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Haan by lead vagera use kyun nahi kar rahe ho?
Customer: Are lead to wo to anti cancer wala de raha hai to.
Executive: Oh.
Customer: Main to gonadotropin wala anti cancer wala drug bhej raha hai to.
Executive: Aapko kaun sa chahiye?
Customer: Gonadotropin wala product to bheja na.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Catalog me dekhiye. aaya hai aapka gynogen HP 75 injection.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ye nahi hai aapke kaam ka?
Customer: Haan wo mera hai dekh rahe hain. 
Executive: Haan to isko use kariye na sir open kar lijiye ek lead IndiaMART sir ek lead use kar lijiye.
Customer: Ek ek ek minute.
Executive: Haan main ruki.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: By lead.
Executive: Haan India ka filter laga lijiye na. Ha gynogen HP 75.
Customer: Abra.
Executive: Isko kariye contact to buy and now.
Customer: Contact to buy and now.
Executive: Kar diya? By aapka naam hai sir Subhankar.
Customer: Haan SMS bhej du kya?
Executive: Haan haan reply bhej dijiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi aap lead manager pe kariye.
Customer: Aur call number bhi hai usme.
Executive: Haan lead manager pe jaake na call kar lena theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Aur baki sir mujhe ye batao aap customer samne se call bhi kar raha hai aap wo bhi reply nahi karte ho customer ka. Calls vagera.
Customer: Haan wo to office se jo ladka hai usko bata raha Danish ko sir phone karne ke liye.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Nahi nahi nahi wo to theek hai.
Customer: Danish aap khud hi call kar lega uska koi issue nahi main Danish ko bol deti hun wo call karne ke liye wo aapko fir se call kar lega. Main ye puch rahi hun ke aapko na customer call kar rahe hain sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap wo reply nahi de rahe ho aapko na 5 tarikh ko ek customer ka call aaya tha.
Customer: Achcha 5 tarikh ko kya tha?
Executive: Naam nahi dikhta sir mujhe bas itna dikhta hai call aaya hai aapne miss kar diya hai. To aap ek baar mujhe batao.
Customer: Wo wo wo main check kar raha tha.
Executive: Main batau kaise check karo aap na lead manager me jao.
Customer: Wo wo mera wo mera bhi ladka hi tha.
Executive: Matlab aap hi khud laga ke check kar rahe the kya?
Customer: Haan haan haan check karta tha.
Executive: Achcha aur by lead nahi dikh rahi hai sir aapko aapke kaam ki dekhna zara aur by lead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan dekh rahe hain ki aur to.
Customer: Ek minute. Uske dost to nahi.
Customer: Wo ek hi to dikh raha hai gynogen.
Executive: India ka filter lagane par abhi aur koi by lead dikh raha hai aapko kaam ka?
Customer: Haan haan. Nahi matlab.
Executive: India ka haan aapne India ka filter lagaya uske baad aapko kaam ka kuch aur by lead dikhta hai?
Customer: Nahi aur to kuch nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo mera to ek hi hai baki to sab pehle ka. Wo to dusra wo kaam ka nahi hai.
Executive: Haan?
Executive: Wo kaam ka nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi. Mera jo gonadotropin wala.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Gonadotropin wala jo. Ek injection bhi HP 75 ye product to dala hai na.
Executive: Haan catalog pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi sir aapka main batau abhi catalog bhi acche se update ho jayega na. To aapko matlab haan abhi Danish ko main bol deti hun wo aapko call kar lega aur sir abhi aur acche se ek baar update ho jayega na to aapko aur acche se by lead aayega. Wo issue nahi hai bas aap na production team ka jab bhi call aaye to aap call sir respond karo. Agar aap call respond nahi karoge na to kya hota hai kya aapka catalog.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Abhi naya naya chal raha hai na isliye thoda problem ho raha hai abhi.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Abhi main Danish ko bol deti hun wo sir aapke number pe call kar lega to aap call arrange karwa dena material vagera provide karwa dena theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Aur call kar lo jo by lead consume kariye sir usme.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay okay.
Executive: Okay. Okay bye.
Executive: Aur sir ek minute aur. Sir ye jo aapka 9696 pe aapne call kiya tha to yaha pe concern raise ho jata hai to koi problem to hai nahi kabhi bhi concern close kar du na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir main Danish ko bol deti hun wo call back kar lega aapko.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai okay. Theek hai okay.
Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called regarding catalog designing team.

- Wants to know why by leads are not used.

- Not replying to customer calls.



Resolution:

- Executive informed catalog designing is in progress.

- Explained about by lead usage.

- Executive will inform Danish to call the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ask Danish to call customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, buyleads, follow up, update
